name: 5-4-3-2-1 Wave for Strength
overview_and_execution: Start at ~80% for 5 reps, increase load each set for 4,3,2, and final 1 near 95%. Possibly do 2 waves if advanced, adding weight each wave.
example_application: Squat: 5×225, 4×245, 3×265, 2×280, 1×295. Next wave: add ~5 lb each set if able.
important_notes: Effective for intermediate lifters needing a structured heavy approach. Keep rest 2-3 min minimum to maintain strength.
